name: ha-statistics

GET.summary:
List of statistics for members of HA cluster.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

help: List of statistics for members of HA cluster.

hostname.name: hostname
hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: Name of the HA member device.

serial_no.name: serial_no
serial_no.title: Serial Number
serial_no.description: Serial number of the HA member device.

tnow.name: tnow
tnow.title: Uptime
tnow.description: Amount of time the HA member device has been operating.

sessions.name: sessions
sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Number of sessions in the HA member device.

sessions6.name: sessions6
sessions6.title: IPv6 Sessions
sessions6.description: Number of IPv6 sessions in the HA member device.

tpacket.name: tpacket
tpacket.title: Packets
tpacket.description: Total packets handled by the HA member device.

vir_usage.name: vir_usage
vir_usage.title: AV Events
vir_usage.description: Number of antivirus events handled by the HA member device.

net_usage.name: net_usage
net_usage.title: Throughput
net_usage.description: The network utilization of the HA member device.

tbyte.name: tbyte
tbyte.title: Bytes
tbyte.description: Total bytes handled by the HA member device.

intr_usage.name: intr_usage
intr_usage.title: IPS Events
intr_usage.description: Total number of IPS events handled by the HA member device.

cpu_usage.name: cpu_usage
cpu_usage.title: CPU Usage
cpu_usage.description: Current CPU usage in the HA member device.

mem_usage.name: mem_usage
mem_usage.title: RAM Usage
mem_usage.description: Total on-board memory usage in the HA member device.

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.title: Uptime
uptime.description: Amount of time HA has been operating on the member device.

response_description: Retrieve a list of statistics for members of the FortiGate's HA cluster.
